title: Create Example Work Bead
description: Comprehensive example work bead demonstrating all required metadata fields for beads-ralph execution. This bead serves as a reference implementation for future work beads. It includes realistic values for a backend development sprint with parallel QA validation.

dev_prompts: Create examples/example-work-bead.json demonstrating all required fields from the bead schema
Include realistic metadata for a backend development sprint: use context from pm/2026-02-08-implementation-plan.md Sprint 1.2a
Populate dev_agent_path, dev_model, and dev_prompts with realistic values for a Python backend implementation task
Populate qa_agents with at least 2 QA agents including schema validator and design reviewer
Ensure all field types match bead_schema.py BeadMetadata class requirements
Validate the completed bead with: python3 scripts/validate-bead-schema.py examples/example-work-bead.json

qa_agents.prompt: Validate examples/example-work-bead.json using scripts/validate-bead-schema.py. Verify the bead passes all Pydantic model validators. Report pass/fail with detailed error messages if validation fails.

valid_fields.description: Number of fields that passed validation

qa_agents.prompt: Review examples/example-work-bead.json for design completeness and accuracy. Check: (1) All required metadata fields are populated with realistic values, (2) Example demonstrates best practices from schema.md, (3) Dev/QA agent configurations are sensible and would execute properly, (4) Field values demonstrate understanding of the beads-ralph system.
